author: wantdd214

review: Oh my! I have had my Fire Stick for a two days now and I'm in love!  Absolutely amazing. Speed is great, no lagging. Apps are amazing. Love my choice in movies.  I have Netflix so I use that but more than anything I use my amazon prime now.  The free movies  on there seems to be a better selection. I am impressed with all the options for kids.  I have 4 and this has been more fun for them than myself I believe.  They play games,  and there are plenty of free educational apps that are just outstanding, watch movies, and watch some of their favorite TV shows from their favorite channels. Again, most all of these are completely free with a prime membership. I enjoy having my music, photos, apps, YouTube, and Pandora  in my tv. Seriously,  this is a win all the way around. And for the price... you just can't beat it.  The remote is easy to use. It was extremely easy to set up and install.  Nothing in the least bit complicated about it.  I am an avid online shopper and this is my most favorite purchase this year by far!
author: Desirae Bennett

review: Great little piece of hardware!  It runs much faster than my Chrome-cast and has more storage space for apps.  It is much more flexible than Chrome-cast.  Apps are built into it, so I don't have to case WatchESPN from my phone or tablet it's already on there.  The number of apps to choose from is great as well.  I am very impressed with it.  I had a little trouble initially to get it to recognize my WiFi.  I re-started my router, and it picked it up immediately.  Other than that the initial set up was very easy and quick.
